snippet.title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru OP [HQ] (SUB) - EP7: Requiem of the Golden Witch opening
snippet.description:
Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru - Requiem of the Golden Witch opening

Music: 
Name: 霧のピトス(Kiri no Pitosu - The Pithos in the Fog)
Vocals: 木野寧、佐倉かなえ (Kino Nei & Sakura Kanae)
Lyrics: 佐倉かなえ (Sakura Kanae) & E. Kida
Composition: Luck-Ganriki & dai
Arrangement: Luck-Ganriki & dai

Mp3: http://www.mediafire.com/?nlumulowezw
Video: http://www.mediafire.com/?mzgmyedy3hl
Thanks for the lyrics to: http://atashi.wordpress.com/2010/07/05/umineko-no-naku-koro-ni-chiru-episode-7-requiem-of-the-golden-witch-opening-theme-kiri-no-pithos-game-size-version/
Pre-order announcement translation: http://pastie.org/1031146

Source: http://www.office-mk.co.jp/pcshop/special/umineko.html
